Dave Skinner wrote:

> in the 1.3 CVS source there is a fetchFTP module that is just *barely*
> started.  it is dated 17-mar-04
>
> Its really bothering me to use wget to fetch FTP stuff so my question is
> "is anybody working on getting FTP to work?"
>
No.  Not at the moment (We'd love a contribution that turned the humble 
Fetch FTP beginings into a fully-fledged fetcher).
Yours,
St.Ack
